text: Carrie Underwood could be making a big change following her accident in 2017 in which she fell, broke her wrist, and needed 40 to 50 stitches in her face. After months of covering up on social media and plenty of speculation about how different her face would look, Underwood has started making public appearances again and is getting candid about what happened to her on that day.
